GroupProject.Title: Amazon loging Website
GroupProject.Description: This project involves the recreation of a the Amazon loging page for the Ecosystem GroupProject. The website features user authentication, requiring an email and password.

Collaborator.Name: Yimei
Collaborator.Contribution: Yimei focused on developing the Javascript functionality for the website.

Collaborator.Name: Shalika
Collaborator.Contribution: Shalika primarily worked on the HTML and CSS to design the website.

Language.Name: Git
Language.Usage: Both collaborators used Git to pull, clone, add, and push their work to GitHub.
